   22: -module(ssh_sftp_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -export([
   25:          suite/0,
   26:          all/0,
   27:          groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1,
   29:          end_per_suite/1,
   30:          init_per_group/2,
   31:          end_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_testcase/2
   34:         ]).
   35: 
   36: -export([
   37:          ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar/1,
   38:          ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar/1,
   39:          async_read/1,
   40:          async_write/1,
   41:          big_file_to_tar/1,
   42:          binaries_to_tar/1,
   43:          block_size_16_crypto_tar/1,
   44:          block_size_1_crypto_tar/1,
   45:          create_empty_tar/1,
   46:          directory_to_tar/1,
   47:          file_owner_access/1,
   48:          files_chunked_to_tar/1,
   49:          files_to_tar/1,
   50:          links/1,
   51:          mk_rm_dir/1,
   52:          null_crypto_tar/1,
   53:          open_close_dir/1,
   54:          open_close_file/1,
   55:          pos_read/1,
   56:          pos_write/1,
   57:          position/1,
   58:          read_6GB/1,
   59:          read_crypto_tar/1,
   60:          read_dir/1,
   61:          read_file/1,
   62:          read_null_crypto_tar/1,
   63:          read_tar/1,
   64:          remove_file/1,
   65:          rename_file/1,
   66:          retrieve_attributes/1,
   67:          set_attributes/1,
   68:          sftp_nonexistent_subsystem/1,
   69:          sftp_read_big_file/1,
   70:          simple_crypto_tar_big/1,
   71:          simple_crypto_tar_small/1,
   72:          start_channel_sock/1,
   73:          stuff/1,
   74:          unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar/1,
   75:          unstuff/1,
   76:          version_option/1,
   77:          write_big_file/1,
   78:          write_file/1,
   79:          write_file_iolist/1
   80:         ]).
   81: 
   82: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   83: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   84: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   85: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   86: 
   87: %% Default timetrap timeout
   88: -define(default_timeout, test_server:minutes(0.5)).
   89: 
   90: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   91: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   92: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   93: 
   94: suite() ->
   95:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   96:      {timetrap,{seconds,20}}].
   97: 
   98: all() -> 
   99:     [{group, not_unicode},
  100:      {group, unicode}
  101:     ].
  102: 
  103: 
  104: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  105:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
  106:        begin
  107: 	   ct:log("file:native_name_encoding() = ~p,~nio:getopts() = ~p",
  108: 		  [file:native_name_encoding(),io:getopts()]),
  109: 	   ssh:start(),
  110: 	   Config
  111:        end).
  112: 
  113: end_per_suite(_onfig) ->
  114:     ssh:stop().
  115: 
  116: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  117: groups() -> 
  118:     [{not_unicode, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  119: 			{group,openssh_server},
  120: 			{group,big_recvpkt_size},
  121: 			sftp_nonexistent_subsystem]},
  122: 
  123:      {unicode, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  124: 		    {group,openssh_server},
  125: 		    sftp_nonexistent_subsystem
  126:                    ]},
  127: 
  128:      {big_recvpkt_size, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  129: 			     {group,openssh_server}]},
  130: 
  131:      {erlang_server, [], [{group,write_read_tests},
  132: 			  version_option,
  133: 			  {group,remote_tar}]},
  134: 
  135:      {openssh_server, [], [{group,write_read_tests},
  136: 			   {group,remote_tar},
  137:                            read_6GB]},
  138: 
  139:      {remote_tar, [], [create_empty_tar, 
  140: 		       ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar,
  141: 		       ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar,
  142: 		       unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar,
  143: 		       files_to_tar,
  144: 		       big_file_to_tar, files_chunked_to_tar,
  145: 		       directory_to_tar, binaries_to_tar, null_crypto_tar, 
  146: 		       simple_crypto_tar_small, simple_crypto_tar_big,
  147: 		       read_tar, read_null_crypto_tar, read_crypto_tar, 
  148: 		       block_size_1_crypto_tar, block_size_16_crypto_tar
  149: 		      ]},
  150: 
  151:      {write_read_tests, [], [open_close_file, open_close_dir, read_file, read_dir,
  152: 			     write_file, write_file_iolist, write_big_file, sftp_read_big_file,
  153: 			     rename_file, mk_rm_dir, remove_file, links,
  154: 			     retrieve_attributes, set_attributes, file_owner_access, async_read,
  155: 			     async_write, position, pos_read, pos_write,
  156: 			     start_channel_sock
  157: 			    ]}
  158:     ].
  159: 
  160: init_per_group(not_unicode, Config) ->
  161:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  162:     {ok,TestDataDir} =
  163:         make_data_sub_dir(Config, "test_data", "test_data_not_unicode"),
  164:     [{user, "Alladin"},
  165:      {passwd, "Sesame"},
  166:      {data, <<"Hello world!">>},
  167:      {data_pos, ["Hej ","hopp"]},
  168:      {filename,     "sftp.txt"},
  169:      {testfile,     "test.txt"},
  170:      {linktest,     "link_test.txt"},
  171:      {tar_filename, "sftp_tar_test.tar"},
  172:      {tar_F1_txt,   "f1.txt"},
  173:      {datadir_tar, TestDataDir}
  174:      | Config];
  175: 
  176: init_per_group(unicode, Config) ->
  177:     case have_unicode_support() of
  178: 	true ->
  179: 	    ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  180:             {ok,TestDataDir} =
  181:                 make_data_sub_dir(Config, "test_data", "test_data_高兴_unicöde"),
  182:             populate_non_unicode(TestDataDir),
  183: 	    NewConfig =
  184: 		[{user, "åke高兴"},
  185: 		 {passwd, "ärlig日本じん"},
  186:                  {data, "foobar å 一二三四いちにさんち"},
  187:                  {data_pos, ["中","国"]},
  188: 		 {filename,     "sftp瑞点.txt"},
  189: 		 {testfile,     "testハンス.txt"},
  190: 		 {linktest,     "link_test語.txt"},
  191: 		 {tar_filename, "sftp_tar_test一二三.tar"},
  192: 		 {tar_F1_txt,   "F一.txt"},
  193: 		 {tar_F3_txt,   "f3.txt"},
  194: 		 {tar_F4_txt,   "g四.txt"},
  195: 		 {datadir_tar, TestDataDir}
  196: 		 | Config %% lists:foldl(fun(K,Cf) -> lists:keydelete(K,1,Cf) end,
  197: 			  %%      Config,
  198: 			  %%      [user, passwd, data,
  199: 			  %%       filename, testfile, linktest,
  200: 			  %%       tar_filename, tar_F1_txt, datadir_tar
  201: 			  %%      ]
  202:                           %%     )
  203: 		],
  204: 	    FN = fn(proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt,NewConfig), NewConfig),
  205: 	    case catch file:read_file(FN) of
  206: 		{ok,FN_contents} ->
  207: 		    ct:log("Readable file:read_file(~tp) ->~n~tp",[FN,FN_contents]),
  208: 		    NewConfig;
  209: 		Other ->
  210: 		    ct:log("Unreadable file:read_file(~tp) ->~n~p",[FN,Other]),
  211: 		    {skip, "Not unicode file reading"}
  212: 	    end;
  213: 
  214: 	_ ->
  215: 	    {skip, "Not unicode file encoding"}
  216:     end;
  217: 
  218: init_per_group(big_recvpkt_size, Config) ->
  219:     [{pkt_sz,123456} | Config];
  220: 
  221: init_per_group(erlang_server, Config) ->
  222:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  223:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  224:     SysDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  225:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  226:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  227:     Sftpd = {_, HostX, PortX} =
  228: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  229: 			     {user_dir, PrivDir},
  230: 			     {user_passwords,
  231: 			      [{User, Passwd}]}]),
  232:     [{peer, {fmt_host(HostX),PortX}}, {group, erlang_server}, {sftpd, Sftpd} | Config];
  233: 
  234: init_per_group(openssh_server, Config) ->
  235:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  236:     Host = ssh_test_lib:hostname(),
  237:     case (catch ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host,
  238: 				       [{user_interaction, false},
  239: 					{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  240:                                         {save_accepted_host, false}
  241:                                        ])) of
  242: 	{ok, _ChannelPid, Connection} ->
  243: 	    [{peer, {_HostName,{IPx,Portx}}}] = ssh:connection_info(Connection,[peer]),
  244: 	    ssh:close(Connection),
  245: 	    [{w2l, fun w2l/1},
  246:              {peer, {fmt_host(IPx),Portx}}, {group, openssh_server} | Config];
  247: 	{error,"Key exchange failed"} ->
  248: 	    {skip, "openssh server doesn't support the tested kex algorithm"};
  249: 	Other ->
  250:             ct:log("No openssh server. Cause:~n~p~n",[Other]),
  251: 	    {skip, "No openssh daemon (see log in testcase)"} 
  252:     end;
  253: 
  254: init_per_group(remote_tar, Config) ->
  255:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  256:     {Host,Port} =  proplists:get_value(peer, Config),
  257:     ct:log("Server (~p) at ~p:~p",[proplists:get_value(group,Config),Host,Port]),
  258:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  259:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  260:     Connection =
  261: 	case proplists:get_value(group, Config) of
  262: 	    erlang_server ->
  263: 		ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port,
  264: 			    [{user, User},
  265: 			     {password, Passwd},
  266: 			     {user_interaction, false},
  267: 			     {silently_accept_hosts, true}]);
  268: 	    openssh_server ->
  269: 		ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port,
  270: 			    [{user_interaction, false},
  271: 			     {silently_accept_hosts, true}])
  272: 	end,
  273:     [{remote_tar, true}, 
  274:      {connection, Connection} | Config];
  275: 
  276: init_per_group(write_read_tests, Config) ->
  277:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  278:     Config.
  279: 
  280: grps(Config) ->
  281:     proplists:get_all_values(
  282:       name, 
  283:       lists:flatten([proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties,Config,[]),
  284: 		     proplists:get_value(tc_group_path,Config,[])])).
  285: 
  286: end_per_group(erlang_server, Config) ->
  287:     ct:comment("End ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  288:     Config;
  289: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  290:     ct:comment("End ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  291:     Config.
  292: 
  293: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  294: 
  295: init_per_testcase(sftp_nonexistent_subsystem, Config) ->
  296:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  297:     SysDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  298:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  299:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  300:     Sftpd = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  301: 				 {user_dir, PrivDir},
  302: 				 {subsystems, []},
  303: 				 {user_passwords,
  304: 				  [{User, Passwd}]}
  305: 				]),
  306:     [{sftpd, Sftpd} | Config];
  307: 
  308: init_per_testcase(version_option, Config0) ->
  309:     Config = prepare(Config0),
  310:     TmpConfig0 = lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config),
  311:     TmpConfig = lists:keydelete(sftp, 1, TmpConfig0),
  312:     Dog = ct:timetrap(?default_timeout),
  313:     {_,Host, Port} =  proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config),
  314:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  315:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  316:     {ok, ChannelPid, Connection}  = 
  317: 	ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  318: 			       [{sftp_vsn, 3},
  319: 				{user, User},
  320: 				{password, Passwd},
  321: 				{user_interaction, false},
  322: 				{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  323:                                 {save_accepted_host, false}
  324:                                ]),
  325:     Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  326:     [{sftp,Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | TmpConfig];
  327: 
  328: init_per_testcase(Case, Config00) ->
  329:     Config0 = prepare(Config00),
  330:     Config1 = lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config0),
  331:     Config2 = lists:keydelete(sftp, 1, Config1),
  332:     Dog = ct:timetrap(2 * ?default_timeout),
  333:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config0),
  334:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config0),
  335:     PktSzOpt = case proplists:get_value(pkt_sz, Config0) of
  336: 		   undefined -> [];
  337: 		   Sz -> [{packet_size,Sz}]
  338: 	       end,
  339:     Config =
  340: 	case proplists:get_value(group,Config2) of
  341: 	    erlang_server ->
  342: 		{_,Host, Port} =  proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config2),
  343: 		{ok, ChannelPid, Connection}  = 
  344: 		    ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  345: 					   [{user, User},
  346: 					    {password, Passwd},
  347: 					    {user_interaction, false},
  348: 					    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  349:                                             {save_accepted_host, false}
  350: 					    | PktSzOpt
  351: 					   ]
  352: 					  ),
  353: 		Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  354: 		[{sftp, Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | Config2];
  355: 	    openssh_server when Case == links ->
  356: 		{skip, "known bug in openssh"};
  357: 	    openssh_server ->
  358: 		Host = ssh_test_lib:hostname(),
  359: 		{ok, ChannelPid, Connection} = 
  360: 		    ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, 
  361: 					   [{user_interaction, false},
  362: 					    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  363:                                             {save_accepted_host, false}
  364: 					    | PktSzOpt
  365: 					   ]),
  366: 		Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  367: 		[{sftp, Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | Config2]
  368: 	end,
  369: 
  370:     case catch proplists:get_value(remote_tar,Config) of
  371: 	%% The 'catch' is for the case of Config={skip,...}
  372: 	true ->
  373: 	    %% Provide a ChannelPid independent of the sftp-channel already opened.
  374: 	    {ok,ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(proplists:get_value(connection,Config)),
  375: 	    [{channel_pid2,ChPid2} | Config];
  376: 	_ ->
  377: 	    Config
  378:     end.
  379: 
  380: end_per_testcase(sftp_nonexistent_subsystem, Config) ->
  381:     Config;
  382: end_per_testcase(rename_file, Config) ->
  383:     NewFileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  384:     file:delete(NewFileName),  
  385:     end_per_testcase(Config);
  386: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  387:     end_per_testcase(Config).
  388: 
  389: end_per_testcase(Config) ->
  390:     {Sftp, Connection} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  391:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Sftp),
  392:     catch ssh_sftp:stop_channel(proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config)),
  393:     ok = ssh:close(Connection).
  394: 
  395: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  396: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  397: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  398: open_close_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  399:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  400:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  401:     ct:log("FileName     = ~p~nSftpFileName = ~p", [FileName, SftpFileName]),
  402:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  403: 
  404:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  405:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  406:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write, creat]),
  407:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write, trunc]),
  408:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [append]),
  409:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read, binary]).
  410: 
  411: open_close_file(Server, File, Mode) ->
  412:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Server, File, Mode),
  413:     ok = ssh_sftp:close(Server, Handle).
  414: 
  415: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  416: open_close_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  417:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  418:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  419:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  420:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  421:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  422: 
  423:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:opendir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  424:     ok = ssh_sftp:close(Sftp, Handle),
  425:     {error, _} =  ssh_sftp:opendir(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  426: 
  427: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  428: read_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  429:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  430:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  431:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  432:     {ok, Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  433:     {ok, Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  434:     {ok, Data} = file:read_file(FileName).
  435: 
  436: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  437: read_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  438:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  439:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  440: 
  441:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  442:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  443:     ct:log("sftp list dir: ~p~n", [Files]).
  444: 
  445: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  446: write_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  447:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  448:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  449:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  450:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  451:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  452:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [Data]),
  453:     {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName).
  454: 
  455: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  456: write_file_iolist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  457:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  458:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  459:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  460: 
  461:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  462:     DataB = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  463:     lists:foreach(
  464:       fun(D) ->
  465: 	      ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [D]),
  466: 	      Expected = try iolist_to_binary(D)
  467:                          catch _:_ -> unicode:characters_to_binary(D)
  468: 			 end,
  469: 	      {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName)
  470:       end,
  471:       [Data, [Data,Data], [[Data],[Data]], [[[Data]],[[[[Data]],Data]]],
  472:        [[[[Data]],Data],DataB],
  473:        [[[[Data]],Data],[[DataB],[[DataB]]]]
  474:       ]).
  475: 
  476: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  477: write_big_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  478:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  479:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  480:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  481: 
  482:     Data = [lists:duplicate(750000,"a"),
  483:             proplists:get_value(data, Config)],
  484:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  485:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  486:     {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName).
  487: 
  488: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  489: sftp_read_big_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  490:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  491:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  492:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  493: 
  494:     Data = [lists:duplicate(750000,"a"),
  495:             proplists:get_value(data, Config)],
  496:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  497:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  498:     {ok, Expected} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  499: 
  500: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  501: remove_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  502:     PrivDir =  proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  503:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  504:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  505:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  506:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  507: 
  508:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  509:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), Files),
  510:     ok = ssh_sftp:delete(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  511:     {ok, NewFiles} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  512:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), NewFiles),
  513:     {error, no_such_file} = ssh_sftp:delete(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  514: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  515: rename_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  516:     PrivDir =  proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  517:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  518:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  519:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  520:     NewFileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  521:     SftpNewFileName = w2l(Config, NewFileName),
  522: 
  523:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  524:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  525:     ct:log("FileName: ~p, Files: ~p~n", [FileName, Files]),
  526:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), Files),
  527:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(NewFileName), Files),
  528:     ok = ssh_sftp:rename(Sftp, SftpFileName, SftpNewFileName),
  529:     {ok, NewFiles} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  530:     ct:log("FileName: ~p, Files: ~p~n", [FileName, NewFiles]),
  531: 
  532:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), NewFiles),
  533:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(NewFileName), NewFiles).
  534: 
  535: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  536: mk_rm_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  537:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  538:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  539:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  540: 
  541:     DirName = filename:join(PrivDir, "test"),
  542:     SftpDirName = w2l(Config, DirName),
  543:     ok = ssh_sftp:make_dir(Sftp, SftpDirName),
  544:     ok = ssh_sftp:del_dir(Sftp, SftpDirName),
  545:     NewDirName = filename:join(PrivDir, "foo/bar"),
  546:     SftpNewDirName = w2l(Config, NewDirName),
  547:     {error, _} = ssh_sftp:make_dir(Sftp, SftpNewDirName),
  548:     {error, _} = ssh_sftp:del_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir).
  549: 
  550: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  551: links(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  552:     case os:type() of
  553: 	{win32, _} ->
  554: 	    {skip, "Links are not fully supported by windows"};
  555: 	_ ->
  556: 	    {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  557: 	    FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  558:             SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  559: 	    LinkFileName = proplists:get_value(linktest, Config),
  560:             SftpLinkFileName = w2l(Config, LinkFileName),
  561: 
  562: 	    ok = ssh_sftp:make_symlink(Sftp, SftpLinkFileName, SftpFileName),
  563: 	    {ok, FileName} = ssh_sftp:read_link(Sftp, SftpLinkFileName)
  564:     end.
  565: 
  566: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  567: retrieve_attributes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  568:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  569:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  570:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  571:     {ok, SftpFileInfo} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  572:     {ok, FileFileInfo} = file:read_file_info(FileName),
  573:     ct:log("ssh_sftp:read_file_info(): ~p~n"
  574:            "file:read_file_info(): ~p",
  575:            [SftpFileInfo, FileFileInfo]),
  576:     {ExpectedUid, ExpectedGid} =
  577:         case {os:type(), proplists:get_value(group,Config)} of
  578:             {{win32, _}, openssh_server} ->
  579:                 %% Windows compiled Erlang is expected will return 0;
  580:                 %% but when Erlang(Windows) client interacts with
  581:                 %% OpenSSH server - value 1000 is received by client
  582:                 %% over SFTP (because OpenSSH is compiled for Linux
  583:                 %% and runs on WSL)
  584:                 {1000, 1000};
  585:             _ ->
  586:                 {FileFileInfo#file_info.uid, FileFileInfo#file_info.gid}
  587:         end,
  588:     ?assertEqual(ExpectedUid, SftpFileInfo#file_info.uid),
  589:     ?assertEqual(ExpectedGid, SftpFileInfo#file_info.gid),
  590:     ok.
  591: 
  592: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  593: set_attributes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  594:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  595:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  596:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  597:     {ok,Fd} = file:open(FileName, write),
  598:     io:put_chars(Fd,"foo"),
  599:     TestWriting =
  600:         fun(FInfo) ->
  601:                 ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName,
  602:                                               FInfo#file_info{mode=8#400}),
  603:                 {error, eacces} = file:write_file(FileName, "hello again"),
  604:                 ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName,
  605:                                               FInfo#file_info{mode=8#600}),
  606:                 ok = file:write_file(FileName, "hello again")
  607:         end,
  608:     TestWriting(#file_info{}),
  609:     IsErlangServer =
  610:         fun() ->
  611:                 TcGroupPath = proplists:get_value(tc_group_path, Config),
  612:                 {_, Path} = lists:unzip(lists:flatten(TcGroupPath)),
  613:                 lists:member(erlang_server, Path)
  614:         end,
  615:     case IsErlangServer() of
  616:         true ->
  617:             ct:log("Testing with writing a complete #file_info record"),
  618:             {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(SftpFileName),
  619:             TestWriting(FileInfo);
  620:         _ ->
  621:             %% with OpenSSH daemon started by other user above instruction end
  622:             %% up with permission denied
  623:             ok
  624:     end,
  625:     ok.
  626: 
  627: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  628: file_owner_access(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  629:     case os:type() of
  630:         {win32, _} ->
  631:             {skip, "Not a relevant test on Windows"};
  632:         _ ->
  633:             FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  634:             SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  635:             {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  636: 
  637:             {ok, #file_info{mode = InitialMode}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, FileName),
  638: 
  639:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#000}),
  640:             {ok, #file_info{access = none}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  641: 
  642:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#400}),
  643:             {ok, #file_info{access = read}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  644: 
  645:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#200}),
  646:             {ok, #file_info{access = write}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  647: 
  648:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#600}),
  649:             {ok, #file_info{access = read_write}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  650: 
  651:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=InitialMode}),
  652: 
  653:             ok
  654:     end.
  655: 
  656: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  657: async_read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  658:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  659: 
  660:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  661:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  662:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  663:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:aread(Sftp, Handle, 20),
  664: 
  665:     receive
  666: 	{async_reply, Ref, {ok, Data}} ->
  667: 	    ct:log("Data: ~p~n", [Data]),
  668: 	    ok;
  669: 	Msg ->
  670: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  671:     after 
  672: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  673:     end.
  674: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  675: async_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  676:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  677:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  678:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  679:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  680:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  681:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  682:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:awrite(Sftp, Handle, Data),
  683: 
  684:     receive
  685: 	{async_reply, Ref, ok} ->
  686: 	    {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName);
  687: 	Msg ->
  688: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  689:     end.
  690: 
  691: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  692: position(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  693:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  694:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  695:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  696: 
  697:     Data = list_to_binary("1234567890"),
  698:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  699:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  700: 
  701:     {ok, 3} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 3}),
  702:     {ok, "4"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  703: 
  704:     {ok, 10} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, eof),
  705:     eof = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  706: 
  707:     {ok, 6} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 6}),
  708:     {ok, "7"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  709: 
  710:     {ok, 9} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {cur, 2}),
  711:     {ok, "0"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  712: 
  713:     {ok, 0} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, bof),
  714:     {ok, "1"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  715: 
  716:     {ok, 1} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, cur),
  717:     {ok, "2"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1).
  718: 
  719: read_6GB(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  720:     ct:timetrap(8*?default_timeout),
  721:     case os:type() of
  722:         {win32, _} ->
  723:             {skip, "/dev/zero not available on Windws"};
  724:         _ ->
  725:             FileName = "/dev/zero",
  726:             SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  727:             {SftpChannel, _ConnectionRef} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  728:             ChunkSize = 65535,
  729:             N = 100000,
  730:             {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(SftpChannel, SftpFileName, [read]),
  731:             ExpectedList = lists:duplicate(ChunkSize, 0),
  732:             [begin
  733:                  MBTransferred = io_lib:format("~.2f", [I * ChunkSize / 1048576.0]),
  734:                  case ssh_sftp:read(SftpChannel, Handle, ChunkSize, timer:minutes(1)) of
  735:                      {ok, ExpectedList} ->
  736:                          [ct:log("~n~s MB read~n", [MBTransferred]) || I rem 10000 == 0],
  737:                          [ct:log(".", []) || I rem 100 == 0];
  738:                      Result ->
  739:                          ct:log("## After reading ~s MB~n## Unexpected result received = ~p",
  740:                                 [MBTransferred, Result]),
  741:                          ct:fail(unexpected_reason)
  742:                  end
  743:              end ||
  744:                 I <- lists:seq(0, N)],
  745:             ok
  746:     end.
  747: 
  748: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  749: pos_read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  750:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  751:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  752:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  753:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_pos, Config),
  754:     [Expect1,Expect2] = Es = [binary_to_list(unicode:characters_to_binary(D)) || D <- Data],
  755:     [Len1,Len2] = [length(E) || E <- Es],
  756:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  757: 
  758:     {ok,Read} = file:read_file(FileName),
  759:     ct:log("File: <~ts>~n<~p>~nExpect1: <~p>~nExpect2: <~p>", [Read, Read, Expect1, Expect2]),
  760: 
  761:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  762:     {async,Ref} = ssh_sftp:apread(Sftp, Handle, {bof, Len1}, Len2),
  763: 
  764:     receive
  765: 	{async_reply, Ref, {ok,Expect2}} ->
  766: 	    ok;
  767: 	Msg ->
  768: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  769:     after 
  770: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  771:     end,
  772: 
  773:    {ok,Expect1} = ssh_sftp:pread(Sftp, Handle, {bof,0}, Len1).
  774: 
  775: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  776: pos_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  777:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  778:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  779:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  780: 
  781:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  782: 
  783:     Data = list_to_binary("Bye,"),
  784:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [Data]),
  785: 
  786:     NewData = list_to_binary(" see you tomorrow"),
  787:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:apwrite(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 4}, NewData),
  788:     receive
  789: 	{async_reply, Ref, ok} ->
  790: 	    ok;
  791: 	Msg ->
  792: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  793:     after 
  794: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  795:     end,
  796: 
  797:     LastData = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  798:     ok = ssh_sftp:pwrite(Sftp, Handle, eof, LastData),
  799: 
  800:     NewData1 = unicode:characters_to_binary("Bye, see you tomorrow" ++ LastData),
  801:     {ok, NewData1} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  802: 
  803: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  804: start_channel_sock(Config) ->
  805:     LoginOpts =
  806: 	case proplists:get_value(group,Config) of
  807: 	    erlang_server -> 
  808: 		[{user,     proplists:get_value(user, Config)},
  809: 		 {password, proplists:get_value(passwd, Config)}];
  810: 	    openssh_server ->
  811: 		[] % Use public key
  812: 	end,
  813: 
  814:     Opts = [{user_interaction, false},
  815: 	    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  816:             {save_accepted_host, false}
  817: 	    | LoginOpts],
  818: 
  819:     {Host,Port} = proplists:get_value(peer, Config),
  820: 
  821:     %% Get a tcp socket
  822:     {ok, Sock} = ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host, Port, [{active,false}]),
  823: 
  824:     %% and open one channel on one new Connection
  825:     {ok, ChPid1, Conn} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Sock, Opts),
  826:     
  827:     %% Test that the channel is usable
  828:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  829:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  830: 
  831:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [read]),
  832:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [write]),
  833: 
  834:     %% Try to open a second channel on the Connection
  835:     {ok, ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Conn, Opts),
  836:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [read]),
  837:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [read]),
  838: 
  839:     %% Test that the second channel still works after closing the first one
  840:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid1),
  841:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [write]),
  842:     
  843:     %% Test the Connection survives that all channels are closed
  844:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid2),
  845:     {ok, ChPid3} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Conn, Opts),
  846:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid3, SftpFileName, [write]),
  847:     
  848:     %% Test that a closed channel really is closed
  849:     {error, closed} = ssh_sftp:open(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [write]),
  850:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid3),
  851: 
  852:     %% Test that the socket is closed when the Connection closes
  853:     ok = ssh:close(Conn),
  854:     timer:sleep(400), %% Until the stop sequence is fixed
  855:     {error,_} = inet:getopts(Sock, [active]),
  856: 
  857:     ok.
  858: 
  859: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  860: sftp_nonexistent_subsystem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  861:     {_,Host, Port} =  proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config),
  862:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  863:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  864:     {error,"server failed to start sftp subsystem"} =
  865: 	ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  866: 			       [{user_interaction, false},
  867: 				{user, User},
  868: 				{password, Passwd},
  869: 				{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  870:                                 {save_accepted_host, false}
  871:                                ]).
  872: 
  873: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  874: version_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  875:     open_close_dir(Config).
  876: 
  877: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  878: create_empty_tar(Config) ->
  879:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  880:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  881:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  882:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  883:     erl_tar:close(Handle),
  884:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
  885:     {ok, #file_info{type=regular}} =
  886: 	ssh_sftp:read_file_info(ChPid, SftpTarFileName).
  887: 
  888: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  889: files_to_tar(Config) ->
  890:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  891:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  892:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  893:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  894:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  895:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose]),
  896:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("f2.txt",Config), "f2.txt", [verbose]),
  897:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  898:     chk_tar([F1, "f2.txt"], Config).
  899: 
  900: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  901: ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  902:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  903:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  904:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  905:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  906:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("f2.txt",Config), "f2.txt", [verbose]),
  907:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  908:     chk_tar(["f2.txt"], Config).
  909: 
  910: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  911: ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  912:     case proplists:get_value(tar_F3_txt, Config) of
  913: 	undefined ->
  914: 	    {skip, "Unicode test"};
  915: 	Fn ->
  916: 	    ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  917: 	    TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  918:             SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  919: 	    {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  920: 	    ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(Fn,Config), Fn, [verbose]),
  921: 	    ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  922: 	    chk_tar([Fn], Config)
  923:     end.
  924: 
  925: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  926: unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  927:     case proplists:get_value(tar_F4_txt, Config) of
  928: 	undefined ->
  929: 	    {skip, "Unicode test"};
  930: 	Fn ->
  931: 	    ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  932: 	    TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  933:             SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  934: 	    {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  935: 	    ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(Fn,Config), Fn, [verbose]),
  936: 	    ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  937: 	    chk_tar([Fn], Config)
  938:     end.
  939: 
  940: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  941: big_file_to_tar(Config) ->
  942:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  943:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  944:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  945:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]), 
  946:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose]),
  947:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  948:     chk_tar(["big.txt"], Config).
  949: 
  950: 
  951: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  952: files_chunked_to_tar(Config) ->
  953:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  954:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  955:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  956:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  957:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  958:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  959:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  960:     chk_tar([F1], Config).
  961: 
  962: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  963: directory_to_tar(Config) ->
  964:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  965:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  966:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  967:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  968:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("d1",Config), "d1", [verbose]),
  969:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  970:     chk_tar(["d1"], Config).
  971: 
  972: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  973: binaries_to_tar(Config) ->
  974:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  975:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  976:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  977:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  978:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  979:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  980:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  981:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}], Config).
  982: 
  983: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  984: null_crypto_tar(Config) ->
  985:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  986:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
  987:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_SendSize=5} end,
  988:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,Bin} end,
  989:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
  990:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  991:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  992:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
  993:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  994:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  995:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  996:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  997:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose,{chunks,15000}]),
  998:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  999:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1, "big.txt"], Config).
 1000: 
 1001: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1002: simple_crypto_tar_small(Config) ->
 1003:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1004:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _Size=6} end,
 1005:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=5} end,
 1006:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_Size=4} end,
 1007:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
 1008:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
 1009:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1010:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1011:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
 1012:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
 1013:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
 1014:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
 1015:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
 1016:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
 1017:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1], Config, [{crypto,{Cinit,Cdec}}]).
 1018: 
 1019: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1020: simple_crypto_tar_big(Config) ->
 1021:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1022:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=6} end,
 1023:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=5} end,
 1024:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=4} end,
 1025:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
 1026:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
 1027:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1028:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1029:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
 1030:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
 1031:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
 1032:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
 1033:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
 1034:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose,{chunks,15000}]),
 1035:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
 1036:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1, "big.txt"], Config, [{crypto,{Cinit,Cdec}}]).
 1037: 
 1038: stuff(Bin) -> << <<C,C>> || <<C>> <= Bin >>.
 1039: 
 1040: unstuff(Bin) -> << <<C>> || <<C,C>> <= Bin >>.
 1041: 
 1042: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1043: read_tar(Config) ->
 1044:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1045:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1046: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1047: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
 1048: 		 ]),
 1049:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1050:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1051:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
 1052:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
 1053:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1054:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1055: 
 1056:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config).
 1057: 
 1058: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1059: read_null_crypto_tar(Config) ->
 1060:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1061:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1062: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1063: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
 1064: 		 ]),
 1065:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
 1066:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _FetchSize=42} end,
 1067:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_SendSize=42*42} end,
 1068:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_FetchSize=19} end,
 1069:     Cendw = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,Bin} end,
 1070:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1071:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1072: 
 1073:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1074:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1075:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1076:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
 1077:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1078:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1079: 
 1080:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1081: 
 1082: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1083: read_crypto_tar(Config) ->
 1084:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1085:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1086: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1087: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
 1088: 		 ]),
 1089:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
 1090:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _FetchSize=42} end,
 1091: 
 1092:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=42*42} end,
 1093:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_FetchSize=120} end,
 1094:     Cendw = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
 1095:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1096:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1097: 
 1098:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1099:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1100:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1101:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
 1102:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1103:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1104: 
 1105:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1106: 
 1107: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1108: block_size_16_crypto_tar(Config) -> cipher_crypto_tar(aes_256_cbc, Config).
 1109: block_size_1_crypto_tar(Config) -> cipher_crypto_tar(aes_256_ctr, Config).
 1110: 
 1111: cipher_crypto_tar(Cipher, Config) ->
 1112:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1113:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1114: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1115: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))},
 1116: 		  {"d1",fn("d1",Config)}  % Dir
 1117: 		 ]),
 1118:     Key = <<"This is a 256 bit key. Boring...">>,
 1119:     Ivec0 = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(16),
 1120: 
 1121:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, crypto:crypto_init(Cipher,Key,Ivec0,[{encrypt,true},
 1122:                                                                 {padding,zero}])} end,
 1123:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, crypto:crypto_init(Cipher,Key,Ivec0,false)} end,
 1124: 
 1125:     Cenc = fun(PlainBin,State) -> 
 1126: 		   CipherBin = crypto:crypto_update(State, PlainBin),
 1127: 		   {ok, CipherBin, State}
 1128: 	   end,
 1129:     Cdec = fun(CipherBin,State) ->
 1130: 		   PlainBin = crypto:crypto_update(State, CipherBin),
 1131: 		   {ok, PlainBin, State}
 1132: 	   end,
 1133: 
 1134:     Cendw = fun(PlainBin, State) ->
 1135:                     CipherBin1 = crypto:crypto_update(State, PlainBin),
 1136:                     Sz1 = size(CipherBin1),
 1137: 		    CipherBin2 = crypto:crypto_final(State),
 1138:                     Sz2 = size(CipherBin2),
 1139: 		    {ok, <<CipherBin1:Sz1/binary, CipherBin2:Sz2/binary>>}
 1140: 	    end,
 1141: 
 1142:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1143:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1144:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1145: 
 1146:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1147:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose]) || {Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1148:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1149: 
 1150:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1151:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1152: 
 1153: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1154: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 1155: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1156: have_unicode_support() -> (file:native_name_encoding() == utf8) andalso ("四" == [22235]).
 1157: 
 1158: 
 1159: make_data_sub_dir(Config, SubDirSrc, SubDirDst) ->
 1160:     SrcDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1161:                            SubDirSrc
 1162:                           ),
 1163:     DstDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1164:                            SubDirDst),
 1165:     ssh_test_lib:copy_recursive(SrcDir, DstDir),
 1166:     {ok,DstDir}.
 1167:     
 1168: 
 1169: prepare(Config0) ->
 1170:     SrcDir = proplists:get_value(datadir_tar,Config0),
 1171:     DstDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config0), ssh_test_lib:random_chars(10)),
 1172:     ssh_test_lib:copy_recursive(SrcDir, DstDir),
 1173:     Keys = [filename,
 1174: 	    testfile,
 1175: 	    linktest,
 1176: 	    tar_filename],
 1177:     Config1 = foldl_keydelete(Keys, Config0),
 1178:     Config2 = lists:foldl(fun({Key,Name}, ConfAcc) ->
 1179:                                   [{Key, filename:join(DstDir,Name)} | ConfAcc]
 1180: 			  end,
 1181: 			  Config1,
 1182:                           lists:zip(Keys, [proplists:get_value(K,Config0) || K<-Keys])),
 1183: 
 1184:     catch ct:log("~p:~p Prepared filenames (Key -> Value):~n~ts",
 1185:                  [?MODULE,?LINE,
 1186:                   [io_lib:format("~p -> ~ts~n", [K,V]) || {K,V} <- Config2,
 1187:                                                           lists:member(K, Keys)]]),
 1188: 
 1189:     DataDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config2),
 1190:     FilenameSrc = filename:join(DataDir, "sftp.txt"),
 1191:     FilenameDst = proplists:get_value(filename, Config2),
 1192:     {ok,_} = file:copy(FilenameSrc, FilenameDst),
 1193:     [{sftp_priv_dir,DstDir} | Config2].
 1194: 
 1195: 
 1196: foldl_keydelete(Keys, L) ->
 1197:     lists:foldl(fun(K,E) -> lists:keydelete(K,1,E) end, 
 1198: 		L,
 1199: 		Keys).
 1200: 
 1201: 
 1202: chk_tar(Items, Config) ->
 1203:     chk_tar(Items, Config, []).
 1204: 
 1205: chk_tar(Items, Config, Opts) ->
 1206:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1207:     chk_tar(Items, TarFileName, Config, Opts).
 1208: 
 1209: chk_tar(Items, TarFileName, Config, Opts)  when is_list(Opts) ->
 1210:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1211:     tar_size(TarFileName, Config),
 1212:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
 1213:     {ok,HandleRead} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid, SftpTarFileName, [read|Opts]),
 1214:     {ok,NameValueList} = erl_tar:extract(HandleRead,[memory,verbose]),
 1215:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleRead),
 1216:     case {lists:sort(expand_items(Items,Config)), lists:sort(NameValueList)} of
 1217: 	{L,L} -> 
 1218: 	    true;
 1219: 	{Expect,Actual} -> 
 1220: 	    ct:log("Expect: ~p",[Expect]), ct:log("Actual: ~p",[Actual]),
 1221: 	    case erl_tar:table(TarFileName) of
 1222: 		{ok,Names} -> ct:log("names: ~p",[Names]);
 1223: 		Other -> ct:log("~p",[Other])
 1224: 	    end,
 1225: 	    ct:log("~s",[analyze_report(Expect, Actual)]),
 1226: 	    ct:fail(bad_tar_contents)
 1227:     end.
 1228: 
 1229: analyze_report([E={NameE,BinE}|Es], [A={NameA,BinA}|As]) ->
 1230:     if
 1231: 	NameE == NameA,
 1232: 	BinE =/= BinA-> 
 1233: 	    [["Component ",NameE," differs. \n  Expected: ",BinE,"\n  Actual: ",BinA,"\n\n"]
 1234: 	     | analyze_report(Es,As)];
 1235: 
 1236: 	NameE < NameA ->
 1237: 	    [["Component ",NameE," is missing.\n\n"]
 1238: 	     | analyze_report(Es,[A|As])];
 1239: 
 1240: 	NameE > NameA ->
 1241: 	    [["Component ",NameA," is not expected.\n\n"]
 1242: 	     | analyze_report([E|Es],As)];
 1243: 	true ->
 1244: 	    analyze_report(Es, As)
 1245:     end;
 1246: analyze_report([{NameE,_BinE}|Es], []) ->
 1247:     [["Component ",NameE," missing.\n\n"] | analyze_report(Es,[])];
 1248: analyze_report([], [{NameA,_BinA}|As]) ->
 1249:     [["Component ",NameA," not expected.\n\n"] | analyze_report([],As)];
 1250: analyze_report([], []) ->
 1251:     "".
 1252: 
 1253: tar_size(TarFileName, Config) ->
 1254:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1255:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
 1256:     {ok,Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(ChPid, SftpTarFileName),
 1257:     io:format('Tar file ~p is~n ~p bytes.~n',[TarFileName, size(Data)]).
 1258: 
 1259: expand_items(Items, Config) ->    
 1260:     lists:flatten(
 1261:       [case Item of
 1262: 	   {_Name,Bin} when is_binary(Bin) -> 
 1263: 	       Item;
 1264: 	   {Name,FileName} when is_list(FileName) ->
 1265: 	       read_item_contents(Name, fn(FileName,Config));
 1266: 	   FileName  when is_list(FileName) ->
 1267: 	       read_item_contents(FileName, fn(FileName,Config))
 1268:        end || Item <- Items]).
 1269: 
 1270: read_item_contents(ItemName, FileName) ->
 1271:     case file:read_file(FileName) of
 1272: 	{ok,Bin} ->
 1273: 	    {ItemName, Bin};
 1274: 	{error,eisdir} ->
 1275: 	    {ok,FileNames} = file:list_dir(FileName),
 1276: 	    [read_item_contents(filename:join(ItemName,Name),
 1277: 				filename:join(FileName,Name)) 
 1278: 	     || Name<-FileNames]
 1279:     end.
 1280: 
 1281: fn(Name, Config) ->
 1282:     Dir = proplists:get_value(datadir_tar, Config),
 1283:     filename:join(Dir,Name).
 1284: 
 1285: fmt_host({A,B,C,D}) -> lists:concat([A,".",B,".",C,".",D]);
 1286: fmt_host(S) -> S.
 1287: 
 1288: 
 1289: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1290: populate_non_unicode(Dir) ->
 1291:     file:delete("f1.txt"),
 1292:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"f3.txt"),
 1293:                          unicode:characters_to_binary("你好")),
 1294:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"F一.txt"),
 1295:                          unicode:characters_to_binary("你好")),
 1296:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"g四.txt"),
 1297:                          <<"How are you?">>).
 1298: 
 1299: w2l(P) ->
 1300:     ssh_test_lib:winpath_to_linuxpath(P).
 1301: 
 1302: w2l(Config, P) ->
 1303:     W2L = proplists:get_value(w2l, Config, fun(X) -> X end),
 1304:     W2L(P).
 1305: 
 1306:
